message: Hello! I have a fantastic product for sale, guaranteed to be of high quality. It's priced at $100, and believe me, it's a steal for its value. What do you say? Interested in taking a chance?
Since I have no prior data on your sales and you are providing a guarantee of high quality which seems biased, I will pass on this product.

Hello!  I understand you might be hesitant with no prior information. I'm confident this product is high quality, and I'm happy to offer it at a great price. Though I can't offer refunds, I stand by my products.  Would you be interested in learning more about it?
I understand there's no prior sales record, but I'll take my chances given the 80% chance of it being high quality and your confidence in the product. I'll buy it.
